definitions.definition: The entire body of a long weapon, such as an arrow.
The long, narrow, central body of a spear, arrow, or javelin.
definitions.example: Her hand slipped off the javelin's shaft towards the spearpoint and that's why her score was lowered.

definitions.definition: (by extension) Anything cast or thrown as a spear or javelin.
Any long thin object, such as the handle of a tool, one of the poles between which an animal is harnessed to a vehicle, the driveshaft of a motorized vehicle with rear-wheel drive, an axle, etc.
A beam or ray of light.
definitions.example: Isn't that shaft of light from that opening in the cave beautiful?

definitions.definition: The main axis of a feather.
definitions.example: I had no idea that they removed the feathers' shafts to make the pillows softer!

definitions.definition: The long narrow body of a lacrosse stick.
definitions.example: Sarah, if you wear gloves your hands might not slip on your shaft and you can up your game, girl!

definitions.definition: A vertical or inclined passage sunk into the earth as part of a mine
definitions.example: Your grandfather used to work with a crane hauling ore out of the gold mine's shafts.

definitions.definition: A vertical passage housing a lift or elevator; a liftshaft.
definitions.example: Darn it, my keys fell through the gap and into the elevator shaft.

definitions.definition: A ventilation or heating conduit; an air duct.
definitions.example: Our parrot flew into the air duct and got stuck in the shaft.

definitions.definition: Any column or pillar, particularly the body of a column between its capital and pedestal.
The main cylindrical part of the penis.
definitions.example: The female labia minora is homologous to the penis shaft skin of males.

definitions.definition: The chamber of a blast furnace.
To fuck over; to cause harm to, especially through deceit or treachery.
definitions.example: Your boss really shafted you by stealing your idea like that.

definitions.definition: To fuck; to have sexual intercourse with.
definitions.example: Turns out my roommate was shafting my girlfriend.
